post_title: FS: Boss Schmidt Throwing & O’Leary Portrait Sovereign 150
post_content:
Price is net to me and delivered with tracking. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or on-going negotiations. 

Schmidt is a really difficult combo and basically your only hope of getting him in an off. Not going to get much nicer for a 1 IMO.

$150 each. Both for $285. 

Thanks for looking!
